snippet: Two Mississippi women who were among a group of 10 people that repeatedly searched the streets of Jackson for black people to assault were sentenced Thursday to multiple years in federal prison.
lead_paragraph: Two Mississippi women who were among a group of 10 people that repeatedly searched the streets of Jackson for black people to assault were sentenced Thursday to multiple years in federal prison.

headline.main: Mississippi: Two More Sentenced in Hate Crime Death
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Two More Sentenced In Hate Crime Death
